title: No API support for Free Accounts?

comments.author: darthmaim.6017
comments.body:
I think you need to create a character first or you will get this error.

Free accounts work for me, example: https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/account?access_token=0EC434E5-DF4E-7F45-8481-F763894E6D8A799DFCE5-12C6-4E9D-BF4C-549BE99F51CC

comments.author: Birman.1705
comments.body:
So I was testing out the API for the system I’m planning to develop and noticed that whenever I tried to query info about a free account, it just gives me {"text":"ErrInternal"}. “GuildWars2” and “HeartOfThorns” type accounts seem to work fine, but free accounts give this error. Is this intended? Or known bug?
What I’m trying to do is the basic /v2/account.
